title: Patch 6.17 Wont load Login Screen
body: So i press launch, and it the login screen does not show up. The window is still there but the screen is black and the client is running smoothly.  it says league of legends at the top left corner (on the border) like what patch it is blah blah, the minimize and exit button are there and so are the borders of the login screen, but that's it. It is all black in the middle

replies.body:
This is pretty common if there's an unstable connection to the login server. Most of the time instability here is caused by local network settings that conflict with the League client's connection. I recommend starting the troubleshooting process by working through the steps outlined in our [connection guide.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)

Let me know if those steps caused any change.
I'm on my 3rd day of League detox, currently downloading new patch :P fingers crossed
Same issue with me, after I press Launch, a black window shows up and closes, including the launcher. All processes remain open.

RIP League

I am also having this problem, Yesterday it was working fine however and now today it seems to be bugged, I've relaunched the League of Legends client, Stopped the process tree in the Task Manager and lastly i've Restarted my computer but to no avail. Anybody wanna chime in on this? Or OP, if you've  found a fix yet?  
 {{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}
